mapper.select: select ck.ck_id,ck.ck_name,ck.ck_state,staff.staff_name from ck left join staff on ck.gly_id=staff.staff_id
select ck.ck_id,ck.ck_name,ck.ck_state,users.user_name from ck left join staff on ck.gly_id=staff.staff_id left join users on staff.user_id=users.user_id where ck_name like '%${ck_name}%'

select staff.staff_name,staff.staff_id from staff left join users on users.user_id=staff.user_id left join user_role on user_role.users_id=users.user_id left join role ON role.role_id = user_role.role_id where role.role_name='仓库长'
mapper.update: update ck set ck_state=0 where ck_id=#{ckId}
update ck set ck_state=1 where ck_id=#{ckId}
mapper.select: select sum(pro_ck_number) as cknumber from pro_ck where ck_id=#{ckId}
select role.role_name from role left join user_role on user_role.role_id=role.role_id left join users on users.user_id=user_role.users_id where users.user_name=#{user_name}
